titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I left Oxford at 11.20 a.m. & reached Hereford at 2.17 p.m. Wynne Willson did the correspondence with me: & I wrote to George. After dinner I instructed William on the Sacrament.
